alert.note: Alert for La Paz; Maricopa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 04 at 6:49AM MST until August 04 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of south central Arizona and west central Arizona, including the following counties, in south central Arizona, Maricopa. In west central Arizona, La Paz. * WHEN...Until 1245 PM MST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 649 AM MST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Up to 1 inch of rain has fallen. - This includes the following streams and drainages... Browns Canyon Wash, Alamo Wash, Grass Wash, Calcite Wash, Tiger Wash, Pump Mine Wash, Dead Horse Wash, Centennial Wash, Old Camp Wash, Salome Wash and Jackrabbit Wash. Additional rainfall amounts of 0.5 to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Gladden, Wenden, Salome, Aguila, Harcuvar, Vicksburg Junction and Vicksburg. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
